title: Dervishes Don't Dance
description: A Guardian is dead. Fae are missing. And someone has let a golem loose in town. Ride along with Kyra Greene, the only pest controller qualified to deal with the strange and wonderful creatures that come out the shadows when magic flares.Dervishes Donâ€™t Dance is the second book in the Valkyrie Bestiary series.
author: Kim McDougall
